cast: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker,Michael Stuhlbarg
title: Arrival
desc: When twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

cast: Chris Pine, Ben Foster, Jeff Bridges, Gil Birmingham
title: Hell or High Water
desc: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

cast: Kang-ho Song, Hee-Bong Byun, Hae-il Park, Doona Bae
title: The Host
desc: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and focuses its attention on attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

cast: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Ethan Hawke,Elijah Smith
title: Boyhood
desc: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

cast: Min-hee Kim, Jung-woo Ha, Jin-woong Jo, So-ri Moon
title: Ah-ga-ssi
desc: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

cast: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio,Kerry Washington
title: Django Unchained
desc: With the help of a German bounty hunter , a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

cast: Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson, Matthew McConaughey, Ralph Fiennes
title: Kubo and the Two Strings
desc: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

cast: Stuart Graham, Laine Megaw, Brian Milligan, Liam McMahon
title: Hunger
desc: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
title: Toy Story 3
desc: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

cast: Anya Taylor-Joy, Ralph Ineson, Kate Dickie, Julian Richings
title: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
desc: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

cast: Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Liev Schreiber
title: Spotlight
desc: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

cast: Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López,Maribel Verdú
title: Pan's Labyrinth
desc: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

cast: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric,Adrien Brody
title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
desc: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

cast: Tom Hanks, Barkhad Abdi, Barkhad Abdirahman,Catherine Keener
title: Captain Phillips
desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

cast: Gaspard Schlatter, Sixtine Murat, Paulin Jaccoud,Michel Vuillermoz
title: Ma vie de Courgette
desc: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to a foster home with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin, Owen Wilson,Katherine Waterston
title: Inherent Vice
desc: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

cast: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake,Rooney Mara
title: The Social Network
desc: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

cast: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt, Paul Dano
title: Looper
desc: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

cast: Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Bradley Cooper,Jennifer Lawrence
title: American Hustle
desc: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild FBI agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and mafia.

cast: Tom Hanks, Mark Rylance, Alan Alda, Amy Ryan
title: Bridge of Spies
desc: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

cast: Isabelle Huppert, Laurent Lafitte, Anne Consigny,Charles Berling
title: Elle
desc: A successful businesswoman gets caught up in a game of cat and mouse as she tracks down the unknown man who raped her.

cast: Zoey Deutch, Nicholas Braun, Mateo Arias, Israel Broussard
title: Good Kids
desc: Four high school students look to redefine themselves after graduation.

cast: Saoirse Ronan, Emory Cohen, Domhnall Gleeson,Jim Broadbent
title: Brooklyn
desc: An Irish immigrant lands in 1950s Brooklyn, where she quickly falls into a romance with a local. When her past catches up with her, however, she must choose between two countries and the lives that exist within.

cast: Sam Neill, Julian Dennison, Rima Te Wiata, Rachel House
title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
desc: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

cast: Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, John Goodman, Alan Arkin
title: Argo
desc: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1980.

cast: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris, Orto Ignatiussen
title: Gravity
desc: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident which leaves them alone in space.

cast: Essie Davis, Andrea Riseborough, Julian Barratt,Kenneth Branagh
title: Mindhorn
desc: A has-been actor best known for playing the title character in the 1980s detective series "Mindhorn" must work with the police when a serial killer says that he will only speak with Detective Mindhorn, whom he believes to be a real person.

cast: Anne Hathaway, Jason Sudeikis, Austin Stowell,Tim Blake Nelson
title: Colossal
desc: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City, and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

cast: Dev Patel, Nicole Kidman, Rooney Mara, Sunny Pawar
title: Lion
desc: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

cast: Ewan McGregor, Pierce Brosnan, Olivia Williams,Jon Bernthal
title: The Ghost Writer
desc: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

cast: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Crews
title: Idiocracy
desc: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

cast: Stephen Lang, Jane Levy, Dylan Minnette, Daniel Zovatto
title: Don't Breathe
desc: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

cast: Mark Wahlberg, Michelle Monaghan, J.K. Simmons, John Goodman
title: Patriots Day
desc: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

cast: Bryan Cranston, Jennifer Garner, Beverly D'Angelo,Jason O'Mara
title: Wakefield
desc: A man's nervous breakdown causes him to leave his wife and live in his attic for several months.

cast: Michael Nyqvist, Noomi Rapace, Ewa Fröling,Lena Endre
title: Män som hatar kvinnor
desc: A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker.

cast: Viggo Mortensen, George MacKay, Samantha Isler,Annalise Basso
title: Captain Fantastic
desc: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

cast: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris,Tyler Perry
title: Gone Girl
desc: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham
title: Furious Seven
desc: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

cast: Russell Crowe, Ryan Gosling, Angourie Rice, Matt Bomer
title: The Nice Guys
desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

cast: Anne Dorval, Antoine-Olivier Pilon, Suzanne Clément,Patrick Huard
title: Mommy
desc: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

cast: Aaron Poole, Kenneth Welsh,Daniel Fathers, Kathleen Munroe
title: The Void
desc: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

cast: Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryô Narita, Aoi Yuki
title: Kimi no na wa
desc: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

cast: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
desc: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.

cast: Kristen Stewart, Lars Eidinger, Sigrid Bouaziz,Anders Danielsen Lie
title: Personal Shopper
desc: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

cast: Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard, Mary-Louise Parker
title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
desc: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

cast: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Kate Mara
title: The Martian
desc: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

cast: Shameik Moore, Tony Revolori, Kiersey Clemons,Kimberly Elise
title: Dope
desc: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

cast: Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks,Ed O'Neill, Kaitlin Olson
title: Finding Dory
desc: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, Dory, begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

cast: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway,Gary Oldman
title: The Dark Knight Rises
desc: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter, Domhnall Gleeson
title: The Revenant
desc: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

cast: Pierre Niney, Paula Beer, Ernst Stötzner, Marie Gruber
title: Frantz
desc: In the aftermath of WWI, a young German who grieves the death of her fiancé in France meets a mysterious Frenchman who visits the fiancé's grave to lay flowers.

cast: Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper, Eva Mendes,Craig Van Hook
title: The Place Beyond the Pines
desc: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo,Ben Kingsley
title: Shutter Island
desc: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

cast: Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone,Akiva Schaffer, Sarah Silverman
title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
desc: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

cast: Morgan Freeman, Ed Harris, Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan
title: Gone Baby Gone
desc: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

cast: Idris Elba, Charlie Hunnam, Rinko Kikuchi,Charlie Day
title: Pacific Rim
desc: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

cast: Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa,Sarah Roemer
title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
desc: A college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.

cast: Bruce Willis, Justin Long, Timothy Olyphant, Maggie Q
title: Live Free or Die Hard
desc: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
title: Iron Man
desc: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

cast: Reese Witherspoon, Laura Dern, Gaby Hoffmann,Michiel Huisman
title: Wild
desc: A chronicle of one woman's 1,100-mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.
